title.rendered: Air Chathams (Airline) office / customer care phone number New Zealand

content.rendered:
Air Chathams Limited is an airline based in Te One, the Chatham Islands, New Zealand. It was established in 1984.

Air Chathams office in Chatham Islands, New Zealand

Address: North Road, Te One, Chatham Islands, New Zealand, 8942

Air Chathams office in Auckland Airport, New Zealand

 Auckland Operational Base Address: 7 Hape Drive, Auckland Airport, 2150

 Phone: 0800 580 127

 International contact phone number:  +64 9 257 0261

Email: nzreservations@airchathams.co.nz

Air Chathams Official website: https://www.airchathams.co.nz/

Air Chathams Online Check-in: www.Air Chathams.com/online check-in

Note Online Checkin location later than 45 minutes prior to the scheduled departure.

Check Air Chathams schedule here: www.Air Chathams.com/flight schedule

Check Air Chathams flight status here: www.Air Chathams.com/flight status

Air Chathams Baggage Allowance

Air Chathams Baggage

View Air Chathams Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link

Air Chathams medical clearance form

For any medical conditions, you need to fill up the form and send to Air Chathams. Download the form here

Travel during pregnant in Air Chathams

Pregnant mother / expectant mother can travel up to 37 th week of the pregnancy for single pregnancy and for multiple pregnancy, they are allowed to travel up to 31st week. After this week, they require to submit a medical form. Download Air Chathams medical form provided above.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Chathams

Total fleet: 15

Saab 340

  • Saab 340

Queries handled by Air Chathams Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Chathams Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Chathams: (click on the stars below)
